sqlMap.select: select a.USER_USERGROUP_ID, a.ORG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.USERGROUP_ID, b.org_name, c.usergroup_name from T01_SYS_USER_USERGROUP a, T01_SYS_ORG b, T01_SYS_USERGROUP c where a.org_id = b.org_id and a.usergroup_id = c.usergroup_id and a.user_id ='$userId$'
select USERGROUP_ID ID,USERGROUP_NAME TEXT from T01_SYS_USERGROUP
select ORG_ID,ORG_NAME from T01_SYS_ORG WHERE 1=1 and ORG_NAME like '%'||#orgName#||'%' order by ORG_ID desc
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T01_SYS_ORG where 1=1 and ORG_NAME like '%'||#orgName#||'%'
